steps.title: Cancel your membership online.
steps.content: Cancel your membership online. Request to cancel your membership online using EOS’s Membership Cancellation Form . You’ll need to sign into your EOS account and provide all the necessary details to close the account. [1] X Research source EOS memberships can be canceled at any time with a 30-day notice. The company offers its members a month-to-month contract. [2] X Research source You can cancel your account from anywhere in the United States, even if you've relocated from the South and West coast areas. You can also visit your local EOS location to cancel your membership in person if you’d like.

steps.title: Visit your local EOS location and speak with a staff member.
steps.content: Visit your local EOS location and speak with a staff member. When you arrive at your local EOS, pop over to the check-in area to speak with a staff member. Let them know that you’d like to cancel your membership. You may be asked for your name, contact details, and membership number. Sign any cancellation forms and return any access items to terminate your account if necessary. [3] X Research source To cancel your membership, all memberships must be in good standing, meaning no past dues are owed. If you owe money, you’re required to pay outstanding fees first. Canceling in person is the only option for EOS members in Florida, Texas, or Utah.

steps.title: Freeze your EOS membership for up to 3 months for $5 a month.
steps.content: Freeze your EOS membership for up to 3 months for $5 a month. Out of town for the month, or life is just too busy? That’s okay! Instead of canceling your EOS membership, you can freeze your account for just $5 a month. Visit your local EOS or provide a written requisition with your agreement or barcode number, the date you’d like your freeze to be effective, and the length of time (up to 3 months). [4] X Research source Send your freeze request via the Contact Us page or email customercare@abcfitness.com.

steps.title: Go to your local EOS for personal training cancellation options.
steps.content: Go to your local EOS for personal training cancellation options. EOS Fitness only allows members to cancel their regular EOS membership once their personal training account is closed first. Personal training accounts are on a separate multi-month contract. You must visit your local EOS location and discuss your cancellation options with the staff members. From there, you’ll be able to cancel your account as normal. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Payments are due upon sign-up and reoccur monthly.
steps.content: Payments are due upon sign-up and reoccur monthly. EOS Fitness charges its members upon sign-up unless there’s a special sale, like $0 down. However, after 14-30 days of enrolling (depending on the billing promotion), you’ll be charged an annual membership fee of $59.99. This occurs each year within 30 days of your first billing anniversary. [6] X Research source For example, if you pay your first annual EOS bill on July 1st, 2024, you’ll be charged an annual fee within 30 days of July 1st, 2025.

steps.title: Reach out to EOS Fitness directly with any missing payment concerns.
steps.content: Reach out to EOS Fitness directly with any missing payment concerns. While there’s nothing about missed payments on EOS’ website, most gyms restrict members' access to amenities or even freeze their accounts. Additionally, some gyms charge late fees while others send your account to collections for outstanding dues. If you have an overdue payment, this may damage your credit score. To avoid this, contact your local EOS if you’re worried about missing a payment. If you’re unable to pay your membership, temporarily freeze your account until you’re in good standing. It’s only $5 per month for up to 3 months. You'll still be charged if your annual fee is due during your freeze. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Refunds are eligible for new members within 3 days of signing up.
steps.content: Refunds are eligible for new members within 3 days of signing up. EOS Fitness has a Right of Rescission Policy that allows all new members to cancel their membership within 3 days of signing up for a full refund. This excludes weekends and holidays. [8] X Research source So, if you sign up on a Monday, you have until Wednesday to receive a full refund for your membership. If you’re new to EOS, you can test the gym with their 7-day free trial. Individuals must be at least 18 years old and have a local ID. Former members can sign up for a free 7-day trial if their previous membership has been canceled for a year.

steps.title: Refunds are issued with proof of death, disability, or relocation.
steps.content: Refunds are issued with proof of death, disability, or relocation. Whether it be a cross-country move, a severe injury, or the loss of a loved one, you can’t always predict what’s going to happen in life. In these scenarios, you may be eligible for a refund from EOS with written proof to customercare@abcfitness.com or your local EOS. If you relocate more than 25 miles from an EOS Fitness, a cancellation charge between $50 and $100 may be added.

steps.title: Basic and Will Do
steps.content: Basic and Will Do EOS’s basic membership gives you 24-hour access to all the cardio and strength training equipment. You’ll also have access to the showers and lockers and receive a complimentary welcome workout. [9] X Research source This plan can cost as low as $9.99 monthly, though membership prices may vary depending on the location.

steps.title: Blue and Will Crush
steps.content: Blue and Will Crush EOS’s second tier membership gives you access to the basic plan, plus the ability to watch movies on the big screen while you work out. You’ll also have access to the swimming pool, hot tub, basketball court, saunas, and access to all EOS locations. Plus, you have many classes to take advantage of, including yoga, dance, cycling, and group fitness. [10] X Research source Contact your local EOS for pricing information, or visit https://joinnow.eosfitness.com/ and select your preferred location.

steps.title: Black and Will Power
steps.content: Black and Will Power Looking for the full gym package? EOS’s top-tier membership program lets you bring a loved one whenever you hit the gym. You get all the benefits of the first two memberships, plus smart strength equipment, massage chairs, compression and wellness therapy, unlimited virtual classes, personalized nutrition programs, and one total body scan per month. [11] X Research source Contact your local EOS for pricing information, or visit https://joinnow.eosfitness.com/ and select your preferred location.
